author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is interested in learning "who" in your organization support the Mayor/Council with regard to communications and public relations.  Job descriptions for those staff that support elected officials in these two areas would be very helpful.
Thank you!
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Communications/Public Relations Support - Mayor/Council
